QuestData.Title: Done Nothing Wrong
QuestData.Description: The Blackrock orcs of the steppes serve a dark master - one who performs twisted experiments on living creatures to create his own menagerie of abominations. Many of his test subjects are as corrupted as their master, but others are completely innocent.$b$bIn the whelping downs to the south, they chain baby dragons to the ground, preparing them for such experiments. I will not stand for this. Break their fetters and return the hatchlings to me... to safety.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Freed Red Whelpling, a Freed Green Whelpling, a Freed Blue Whelpling, and a Freed Bronze Whelpling.
QuestData.CompletionText: I hope we weren't too late.
QuestData.RewardText: I will see to it that these dragons are taken care of.
